ds2.1.5:1.2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, somanassindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvācā hoti, sammākammanto hoti, sammāājīvo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti, saddhābalaṁ hoti, vīriyabalaṁ hoti, satibalaṁ hoti, samādhibalaṁ hoti, paññābalaṁ hoti, hiribalaṁ hoti, ottappabalaṁ hoti, alobho hoti, adoso hoti, amoho hoti, anabhijjhā hoti, abyāpādo hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, hirī hoti, ottappaṁ hoti, kāyapassaddhi hoti, cittapassaddhi hoti, kāyalahutā hoti, cittalahutā hoti, kāyamudutā hoti, cittamudutā hoti, kāyakammaññatā hoti, cittakammaññatā hoti, kāyapāguññatā hoti, cittapāguññatā hoti, kāyujukatā hoti, cittujukatā hoti, sati hoti, sampajaññaṁ hoti, samatho hoti, vipassanā hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.5:1.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.5:2.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.5:3.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṁ cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.5:4.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.5:5.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṁ—
ds2.1.5:6.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.5:7.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:8.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.5:9.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo—
ds2.1.5:10.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.5:11.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:12.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.5:13.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:14.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:15.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:16.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:17.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.5:18.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.5:19.2: Yo tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
ds2.1.5:20.2: Yā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ anaññātānaṁ adiṭṭhānaṁ appattānaṁ aviditānaṁ asacchikatānaṁ sacchikiriyāya paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:21.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:22.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:23.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:24.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:25.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:26.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:27.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:28.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:29.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.5:30.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:31.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:32.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:33.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:34.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.5:35.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.5:36.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṁ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.5:37.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.5:38.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:39.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṁ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.5:40.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.5:41.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:42.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.5:43.2: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.5:44.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭipassaddhi passambhanā paṭipassambhanā paṭipassambhitattaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—
ds2.1.5:45.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭipassaddhi passambhanā paṭipassambhanā paṭipassambhitattaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—
ds2.1.5:46.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa lahutā lahupariṇāmatā adandhanatā avitthanatā—
ds2.1.5:47.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa lahutā lahupariṇāmatā adandhanatā avitthanatā—
ds2.1.5:48.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa mudutā maddavatā akakkhaḷatā akathinatā—
ds2.1.5:49.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa mudutā maddavatā akakkhaḷatā akathinatā—
ds2.1.5:50.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa kammaññatā kammaññattaṁ kammaññabhāvo—
ds2.1.5:51.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa kammaññatā kammaññattaṁ kammaññabhāvo—
ds2.1.5:52.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa paguṇatā paguṇattaṁ paguṇabhāvo—
ds2.1.5:53.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa paguṇatā paguṇattaṁ paguṇabhāvo—
ds2.1.5:54.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa ujutā ujukatā ajimhatā avaṅkatā akuṭilatā—
ds2.1.5:55.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa ujutā ujukatā ajimhatā avaṅkatā akuṭilatā—
ds2.1.5:56.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:57.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:58.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:59.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:60.2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:61.2: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.5:61.4: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.5:62.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, navindriyāni honti, pañcaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti, ekā vedanā hoti, ekā saññā hoti, ekā cetanā hoti, ekaṁ cittaṁ hoti, eko vedanākkhandho hoti, eko saññākkhandho hoti, eko saṅkhārakkhandho hoti, eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti, ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ hoti, ekaṁ manindriyaṁ hoti, ekā manoviññāṇadhātu hoti, ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.5:62.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.5:63.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhā abyāpādo sammādiṭṭhi hirī ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā sati sampajaññaṁ samatho vipassanā paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.5:63.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.5:64.2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.5:87.2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… aññindriyaṁ hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.5:88.2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ anavasesappahānāya tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… aññindriyaṁ hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.5:89.2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāya catutthāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… aññindriyaṁ hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.5:90.2: Yā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ñātānaṁ diṭṭhānaṁ pattānaṁ viditānaṁ sacchikatānaṁ sacchikiriyāya paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ, idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye aññindriyaṁ hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.5:90.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
